Reviews.Title: Excellent Value/Budget Tablet
Reviews.Author: rpv

logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo38HVFWNUUI0PIcurrentClick) { return cv_mo38HVFWNUUI0PIcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 9:44 MinsProntoTec Q8 7 inch Dual Core Tablet is a very good value in price per performance. It has 4 GB SDRAM. After installing bunch of applications, I still had available 2 GB. This runs Android 4.2.2. Android. Unlike other reviewers I did not face any issue at all out of the box and have been using for 3 days with no issues. Obviously you should know the feature set and use within the limit. I will go into the specifications and review based on my user experience. I got the blue model and reviewed it, and this is same with the color change.Most of tablets have ARM based processors. This makes sure all of the Apps in Google Play ecosystem is available. This has Cortex A8 Dual Core 1.2 GHz. If you look at my video review, I have screenshots showing the CPU speed and other kernel details. The screen is 800 x 480 Pixels and has a RAM of 512MB. This supports a wireless and cellular with Wi-Fi (802.11 BGN) and Support for 3G Dongles. Settings page has a IMEI number already assigned. Tablet has 2 cameras - Front 0.3M/Rear 2M. There is a built-in 2800mAh Rechargeable Lithium Battery. Battery came for a good 5 hours with moderate usage. Battery usage really depends on how heavy you use the system. Overnight it drained very less. Mobile Networking was on by default. I switched off as I was using only Wi-Fi mode. I suggest you go to Settings and tweak things which are not required. Developer Mode was enabled by default. I turned it off. The capacitive touch screen was really good, some occasions I had to press little harder and at right locations, but pinch-zoom, highlight, Copy-Paste all worked very well.It is great the tablet has HDMI interface along with micro USB Port, 3.5-mm stereo Headphone Jack, built-in speaker, microphone, micro SD card slot and a DC Input Jack. Note that for powering through wall adapter you need to use the provided DC input jack. I was surprised with the HDMI port inclusion and I can connect this to a HDMI capable monitor or any HDTV. Speaker was loud enough. IN a room, once I keep the tablet in a stand it was good. Speaker is on the backside, so you don't want to lie this down on back as it will hamper the audio coming out. This is a designAndroid tablets are really customizable to your heart's content. It is here where ProntoTec shines. Using a native Android 4.2.2, they have achieved something at a low cost. This can have a very wide reaching audience. In many countries, where affordability is key, having a tablet like this with Wi-Fi is a big boon. Imagine having entire Wikipedia at your fingertips for a child. I tried few educational applications on this. I consider this as a big hit with educators than gamers.I tried Google Voice Search and asked "what is capital of United States". The voice recognition part was great and it was able to recognize and dictate the answer. I also tried Wolfram Alpha and asked bunch of questions. E.g., what is world population, what is population of China etc? The microphone picked up correctly and answered through Wolfram Alpha. Apps like Calculator, Gmail performed flawlessly.I watched multiple video through few applications. Obvious first choice was YouTube. Was able to search and watch videos. I used TwIT.TV app and watched some segments of a podcast (video streaming through wifi). Again smooth playback. Handholding is really easy given the weight of it. It was a colorful blue; no heat observed handholding the tablet. It is plastic, and buttons are made of plastic. For a kid, this is perfect also though the feature set is equally appealing to an adult. I was so enamored with low cost computers in late 90s and it seems I am reliving them with tablet. If you want to listen to podcasts/watch video then this is perfect. Just keep it in a stand and connect to power. See my video review to get an idea of what I am referring to. For a computer geek, it is a challenge to design something with minimal resources - screen resolution, RAM, storage, chipset. ProntoTec has designed a tablet with budget conscious customer in mind. Out of the box, it worked to my satisfaction given the specification and price. Once powered on, it directly came to a working condition. No need to setup account prior to using. I signed with wifi, the wifi router was in one bedroom. I configured in another room separated by two rooms. There was no issue with wifi signal. Once connected, I created a Google account as well. I generated a Application Specific password as I had 2 factor authentication. Once signed on, I updated applications like YouTube, Google Keyboard etc. I also downloaded few applications like TwitT.TV, Tetris from EA, etc. I downloaded Chrome and browsed few websites. Listened to Audio / Watched Video. Out of the box battery needed a full charge. Initially without charge, I did a video stream and wanted to see how device shutdown. Sure enough it shut down as battery drained. Powered on after charging and everything was fine.I am impressed enough at the engineering for the price/value/budget it delivers. Cortex-A8 Processor is an ARM Cortex(tm)-A8 processor, based on the ARMv7 architecture, has the ability to scale in speed from 600MHz to greater than 1GHz. The Cortex-A8 processor can meet the requirements for power-optimized mobile devices needing operation in less than 300mW; and performance-optimized consumer applications requiring 2000 Dhrystone MIPS. This is from ARM specification. ProntoTec has pulled in many off the shelf components and assembled at a terrific value. I was particularly interested how it performs to streaming video. That is the golden test and it performed beautifully!

Reviews.Title: Affordable!
Reviews.Author: KPAk
Reviews.Content: I bought seven of these based on the ratings. I feel this product should have a higher rating for these reasons:FIRST: PRICE is affordable. You cant walk into best buy or any store and buy a tablet for this price. You just can't.2nd: I bought these products as gifts to some friends who are just beginning to learn the tablet world and what apps are. This is great for the basic internet use and games.Third: I would recommend this product to anyone who just wants a tablet to surf the net, facebook, skype, watch netflix.. I mean thats what we do on our apple products anyways so why pay sooooo much when you can get the same thing for a cheaper price??

Reviews.Title: Totally Dissapointed
Reviews.Author: Dina
Reviews.Content: The image looks good, it supposedly offers alot but once you open it, power it on, it's truly a horrible purchase. The software on it or operating system is very slow. We received it less than 2 hours ago and we already submitted a return request. YES it's that bad. If you can afford to spend $60, an extra $40 won't kill you in the sense of getting something a little better than this. That's what we intend to do.

Reviews.Title: Had to return it!
Reviews.Author: Trudy
Reviews.Content: The item arrived quickly but it was defective. The andriod screen would pop up and would stay on the screen until i held the power button down for 30 seconds for it to go away. Google Play store was on the tablet the first day and was gone the next day.

Reviews.Title: slow
Reviews.Author: renee
Reviews.Content: Product is extremely slow. I always end up going back to my phone to surf the internet. I don't recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Very Cheap
Reviews.Author: Robert Bilic
Reviews.Content: Is not bad at all for that price you can`t buy better tablet for kids is very good. I would not recommend this to somebody who looks for something to work with it. Good build quality and also nice for games and internet browsing.

Reviews.Title: It is not an Ipad but it is a good tablet
Reviews.Author: Casey
Reviews.Content: It is not the fastest nor the brightest but it is under $50. I received my tablet yesterday and its is 4gb but has a spot for additional storage. It is super easy to take screen shots and pictures with. It is a little slow for my preference but I will be mainly using it as a replacement for my Kindle Fire which was stolen. It is a GREAT tablet for the PRICE!!

Reviews.Title: Perfect for my 3 year old daughter
Reviews.Author: Isaac Mejia
Reviews.Content: I purchased this tablet for my 3 year old daughter and she loves it. I put a whole bunch of apps for kids on it and she is learning on it, she draws and colors and plays games. At this price its a really good tablet and she likes that its pink, her favorite color.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: Wilvelisse Alvarado
Reviews.Content: It is a very well made tablet and the price can't be beat i recommended it to all My friends and family

Reviews.Title: Excellent tablet
Reviews.Author: Mohammed
Reviews.Content: I bought two devices, my kids are so pleased enjoying playing games and watching movies on you tube. The Tablet is a very good value in price per performance.

Reviews.Title: tablet
Reviews.Author: sheena whittingham
Reviews.Content: Love the colour the it all together an the play store is already downloaded on it very easy to use

Reviews.Title: not very impressed.
Reviews.Author: Cynthia fox
Reviews.Content: Battery Dies Fast. Very Slow Up Load. The Touch Is Off On The Left Side Of The Screen. Tablet Freezes A Lot Too.

Reviews.Title: Seriously flawed
Reviews.Author: Jessica Hicks
Reviews.Content: For some reason, parts of the "touch" screen won't work when touched. Conveniently, in the menu area. Would not recommend...

Reviews.Title: Not what I was hoping for
Reviews.Author: Cmh
Reviews.Content: not happy. unable to use keyboard problems with face book. I did want an android, have not not tried camera yet so have no opinion yet

Reviews.Title: Pronto Tech 7"
Reviews.Author: Jackie W.
Reviews.Content: Bought a total of 5 for my great nieces and nephews. They like them quite a bit, no complaints - good price.

Reviews.Title: This is overall a good tablet for my kid
Reviews.Author: Chaunsay
Reviews.Content: It works fine it's just that the wording for typing comes up as Chinese letters... I don't understand that part but she likes it.

Reviews.Title: OK
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This tablet seems to functions fine, but does not work with Square credit card reader which is what I bought if for.

Reviews.Title: Quality of PronoTec tablet
Reviews.Author: Deenise35 "d"
Reviews.Content: The customer service was great. My item was delivered before the assumed date given online. Very much appreciated. I was hoping to get a complete booklet on how to manuever around  the tablet since it was a gift and new to me.Thank you, Dee

ProductInfo.Features:
CPU: Cortex A8 Dual Core 1.2Ghz
7-Inch Capacitive 16:9 / 5-Point Touch Screen, TFT 800 x 480 Pixels
512M DDR3 RAM / 4G ROM (3G Available) / Support TF Card Expansion up to 32G
Android 4.2.2 OS, Google Play Store Pre-Load, Support SKYPE, YouTube, Facebook and more!
US Worry-Free Warranty
ProductInfo.Name: ProntoTec 7" Android 4.2 Tablet PC, Cortex A8 1.2 Ghz Dual Core Processor,512MB / 4GB,Dual Camera,HDMI,G-Sensor (Pink)
